body:
hi,

     I am here to give a massive thank you to the whole staff team who have almost completely stopped team killing .Due to the amount of moderators now running the server no one dares to team kill and this makes the server epic and very fun to play.In old avicus( avicus 0.1)people would be team killing left right and center and when you use the /report there was no staff to be seen,now there is multiple staff who come!Anyway,a big thank you to the whole staff team for making Avicus the best it could be:)

regards,
endergodx

endergodx
title: staff thank you!

replies.body: There was this one really disrespectful person who was criticizing the staff and saying ghost clients should be allowed. I just want to say that you guys are awesome and the majority of people think that, too!
replies.body_tagged: There was this one really disrespectful person who was criticizing the staff and saying ghost clients should be allowed. I just want to say that you guys are awesome and the majority of people think that, too!

replies.body: Thank you for posting this!!! :D this really does mean a lot to us! We want to make sure that your time on this server if fun and well spent! We hold this server to high regards and we hope to keep it that way. Thank you for showing us your appreciation!
replies.body_tagged: Thank you for posting this!!! :D this really does mean a lot to us! We want to make sure that your time on this server if fun and well spent! We hold this server to high regards and we hope to keep it that way. Thank you for showing us your appreciation!
